▣ PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Albemarle                                               Jan. 2015 - Present
Company Profile : Global Major FCC Catalyst Manufacturer
FCC Catalyst Technical Service Consultant
Managed FCC(Fluidized catalytic cracker) catalyst customers(refiners) providing unit operation consultation and technical service
Prepared catalyst formulation and proposals
Co-worked with FCC catalyst sales representative.
Won/maintained contract of cat supply for following units so far. Contract renewed every 2-3 yrs by tender process and commercial trials.
Hyundai Oilbank FCC(44 mm$/yr) since 2015
SK Energy FCC 1/2(45 mm$/yr) since 2015
S-OIL HS-FCC(30 mm$/yr) since 2019
FCC process is one of major heavy oil upgrading units in refinery. There are 7 FCC units in Korea. Most of Korean units are very big in terms of feed rate and catalyst consumption. Asia region is fast growing market for FCC catalyst and Korean refiners are benchmark.
FCC unit is regarded as very sophisticated and profitable processes in refinery. FCC catalyst sales is highly rely on technical sales activity. Refiners expect Catalyst vendors to be FCC experts-operations, design and catalyst.
Typically, refiners are very conservative and catalyst change in FCC unit is big event which takes long time and several staged actions. It is key to maintain long term relationship and to be recognized as accountable partner.
It is also important to work as a team and have effective communication. The ALB operates world-wide by many team members across the world. And refinery society is small world and reputation is very important. Small miscommunication and/or misbehavior could lead to serious damage to business.
GS Caltex(refinery)                                           Dec. 2005 - Dec. 2014
Company Profile : Regional major refinery in Korea
Process Engineer
Provided technical service for following units
- FCC, Vacuum Distillation Unit, Sulfur Recovery Unit, Hydrogen Manufacturing Plant,
 Utilities, Reformer, Gasoline Hydrodesulfurization unit
Involved mega project for grass-root hydro-cracker(1.1 bill $ project)
The mega project targeted to build stand-alone hydrocracker unit and the project scope included utilities, vacuum unit, hydrogen plant and sulfur recovery unit.
Joined the project in design stage and participated unit design, training, construction, and initial start-up. After successful start-up of all units, optimization, troubleshooting and debottlenecking were done in next 1 yrs..
Mostly worked as process engineer, who monitor, optimize, troubleshoot and plan for turn-around work and improvement.
Have broad experience in refinery operation from planning, several unit operation, crude oil and product specification and catalyst operation/evaluation.
Conducted FCC catalyst trial: BASF trial, Intercat ZSM-5 and SOx additive trials
Hyundai Motor                                               Dec. 2004 - Nov. 2005
Company Profile : Global car manufacturer
